snippet: Scott Piercy tied a tournament record with a nine-under-par 63 to take a one-stroke lead after the first round of the Houston Open.
abstract: Scott Piercy takes lead in first round of Houston Open with nine-under-par 63.
lead_paragraph: Scott Piercy tied a tournament record with a nine-under-par 63 to take a one-stroke lead after the first round of the Houston Open.

headline.main: A Record Tied at Houston Open
headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Golf; Tournament Record at Houston Open
